item.scguns_oregunized.assassin_dagger_t: An easily concealed, sharply honed dagger often used for the assassinations by members of the Order
raid.scguns.stellar_order.name: Summons the Stellar Order
raid.announcement.scguns_oregunized.stel: The Strike Force of the Order is here!
scguns.desc.whirlwind: Scientists, engineers, ministers. People who knew about the horrors happening in the Federacy and didn't stand aside, formed the Stellar Order to fight in the shadow.
scguns.desc.hermes: A powerful hand cannon that helped the Stellar Order deal with paranormal activities inside the secret laboratories of the Federacy.
scguns.desc.avantrima: Quick burst of 4 rounds guaranteed success in every covert operation and made it a reliable standard issue of Arphilem strike force subdivision.
scguns.desc.haretrot: Extra quiet, extra deadly. Sharp lead bolts fired under the high pressure were able to penetrate any armor worn by the Asgharian forces.
scguns.desc.volter_sp: First shockarm experiment of the Order; this easily concealable electric scatter pistol has proven to be a trusty sidearm.
scguns.desc.mactricia: Standard Issue of the Volter's Sector strike force, a subdivision organized by the brilliant engineer and commander Volter to simplify the management of the Order.
scguns.desc.amperbreaker: Production of this weapon was a pain to the Stellar Order, but that doesn't compare to the pain of those who had to suffer through the horrors of the soul harvesting.
scguns.desc.jupiter-7: Directed Redstone flux energy conducted through the amethyst crystal creates a powerful light beam capable of scorching the enemy flesh.
